TEXT: The applicant is an NORP national , born in DATE and currently detained in GPE . Before the ORG , he is represented by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .

In DATE , the applicant , accused of belonging to a criminal association and of drug - trafficking , was arrested . The suspicions against him were partly based on the content of certain wiretappings .
In an order of CARDINAL DATE , the investigating judge committed the applicant for trial , commencing on DATE before ORG .
In a judgment of CARDINAL DATE , filed with the registry on CARDINAL DATE , ORG , relying on the content of the wiretappings , sentenced the applicant to DATE imprisonment .
The applicant and ORG lodged an appeal with ORG .
In a judgment of DATE , filed with the registry on DATE , ORG confirmed the first - instance decision .
The applicant appealed on points of law .
In a judgment of DATE , ORG rejected the appeal .
